definition: the part of a building above the ground floor, on a floor above, on or of upper floors of a building
details:
noun
- the part of a building above the ground floor
= example: the part of a building above the ground floor
adverb
- on a floor above
= example: on a floor above
= synonyms: up the stairs
- with respect to the mind
= example: with respect to the mind
adjective
- on or of upper floors of a building
= example: on or of upper floors of a building
= synonyms: upstair
